meanings.definition: The quality or state of lacking style.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit's stylelessness made it hard to stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The room's stylelessness was evident in its plain white walls and lack of decoration.
meanings.sent3: Despite the stylelessness of his jokes, they always managed to make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The painting's stylelessness was like a blank canvas waiting for inspiration to strike.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity and stylelessness of the design made it timeless and elegant.

meanings.definition: The absence of a distinctive or unique manner of expression.
meanings.sent1: The writer's stylelessness in his writing made it hard to distinguish his work from others.
meanings.sent2: The song's stylelessness made it blend in with the background music.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's stylelessness on stage was surprisingly refreshing to the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her speech's stylelessness was like a plain white sheet of paper waiting to be filled with color.
meanings.sent5: The play's stylelessness allowed the actors to shine and bring their own personalities to the characters.
